HwTheme.title: Monet's Garden
HwTheme.author: 华为官方主题设计团队
HwTheme.designer: 华为官方主题设计团队
HwTheme.briefinfo-en: Under the delicate brushstrokes of Monet, the purple-red iris on the shore scorched open, and there were little daisies hiding beside, swaying in the wind, like a sweet and smiling little girl who was easy to be shy. Click the sticker below to create your and Monet’s Encounter~
HwTheme.briefinfo-cn: 莫奈细腻的笔触下，岸上的紫红鸢尾灼灼而开，还有躲在一旁的小雏菊，在风中摇曳，像甜美爱笑却容易羞怯的小女孩，点击下方贴纸，创造你与莫奈的邂逅～
